pages.text:
.entry-header
About
Gramma Dot’s
Gramma Dot’s, est 1987, was named after Dorothy Stearns, or “Gramma Dot” as she was fondly known. She was an avid sailor, sportswoman, published author and artist. Her lifelong love of the sea and especially Sanibel lives on in her namesake restaurant. Gramma Dot’s has won the Taste of the Island – People’s Choice Award seven years in a row now. After navigating through COVID-19 and Hurricane Ian, operating with just a food truck, we are happy to be back better than ever, offering the same great menu only adding a full bar including liquor, beer and wine. We’re thrilled to have our same great team on board with us and can’t wait to serve you!
Our Marina
Located near the iconic lighthouse at the southern tip of Sanibel Island, Sanibel Marina is your gateway to Florida’s stunning Gulf Coast. With direct access to the Gulf of Mexico and easy reach to nearby islands, beaches, and Fort Myers, our marina is perfectly positioned for your adventures on the water. We pride ourselves on being a premier marina, offering everything from boat storage to fuel and a well-stocked ship store. Don’t forget to visit our renowned dockside restaurant, Gramma Dot’s Seaside Dining, where you can savor the freshest local seafood in a charming waterfront setting.
We welcome you to come visit us by land or sea!
Hope to see you soon.
.entry-content .clear
